price: 10. Tokkel sinni Rabbil dambi cabti essirita keenik exce, diggah usuk maggom dambi cabti li kinnik.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
